pageContext.title: Building an Accessible Future for the Humanities
pageContext.description_excerpt: The Building an Accessible Future for the Humanities Project facilitated four two-day long workshops where humanists, librarians, information scientists, and cultural heritage professionals can learn about technologies, design standards, and accessibility issues associated with the use of digital technologies. This important project is a partnership with the BrailleSC.org project.
pageContext.participants: Clay Jeffcoat, Cory Bohon, James Smith, Jennifer Guiliano, Jeremy Boggs, Kirsten Keister, Marty R. McKenzie, Tina Herzberg
